special_text:
[i](At the beginning of your upkeep, if you weren’t dealt combat damage since your last turn, put a brick counter on this Outpost.)[/i]
When this Outpost enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
 2+ Bricks
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
 4+ Bricks
{R}{G}{W}{U}, {T}: Draw three cards.
